title: Grant-Kohrs Ranch National Historic Site: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Guest Speakers Bring a park ranger into your classroom.  We offer several standards based programs that will enhance your curriculum.   All Guest Speakers   Guest Speaker Programs    Guest Speaker Programs Learn More     Field Trips Bring your students to Grant-Kohrs Ranch for a unique educational experience.  Park Rangers may be able to offer free programs for school groups on topics such as pioneer life, the Open Range cattle era, the cowboy, the chuck wagon, blacksmithing, livestock and much more.  All Field Trips   Field Trip    Experience Grant-Kohrs Ranch Learn More     Curriculum Materials Make historic cattle ranching and much more come alive for your students through Grant-Kohrs Ranch.  Explore the standards based lesson plans to bring the ranch into your classroom.     All Curriculum Materials   Lesson Plan    Adventures in the Wild Learn More     Traveling Trunks Do your students want to wear chaps, hear the jingle of spurs as they walk across the room, or feel the rawhide of a quirt? Explore our Cowboy Gear Traveling Trunk. All Traveling Trunks   Traveling Trunk    Cowboy Gear Traveling Trunk Learn More
